articles.title: Hockey World Cup: South Korea Photo journalist falls into open drain in Bhubaneswar - OTV News
articles.description: As per initial reports, the photo journalist, who is now in Bhubaneswar, to cover the Hockey World Cup fell into the open drain while having a cup of tea at a roadside stall at Dumduma area.
